data.title: Middle School â€“ The Montessori School of Westfield
data.text:
Ages 12-14

Student leadership, collaboration and the development of the sense of self is what makes Montessori middle school so different from traditional classrooms. From student led meetings to micro-economies to stewardship of their school environment, our Middle School students leave for High School with a deep understanding of social, economic, environmental and ethical leadership challenges they will inevitably face later on in their lives.

This program emphasizes inquiry based problem solving, applied scientific method, diversity and perspective while encouraging compassionate and respectful relationships and the responsible and ethical use of technology.

Admissions
